name: BACK OF SPACE
description:
From the creators of OLDTV, comes a unique sequel.
A Solar flare is coming to wipe out the internet, save the internet while dealing with personal issues.

Features:


  • Download data, sell data, save the internet before it's wiped out by a solar flare.
  • Upgrade Drones/Modems/Server.
  • Resolve Personal Issues while saving the world.
  • Mad soundtrack.
  • Explore a creepy story.
  • Collect every satellite on this planet.

BACKOFSPACE is the spiritual sequel to OLDTV.

OLDTV introduced a new game idea, and now we're building a game that's x11 times bigger than OLDTV.
